mapper.select: select top 1 userInfo.user_name as name, attendance_type, out_attendance, CONVERT(VARCHAR(100),attendance_time,100) AS attendance_time, attendance_address, AttendanceRule.rule_name as ruleName from userInfo LEFT JOIN AttendanceRecord on AttendanceRecord.user_id = userInfo.user_id left join AttendanceRule on AttendanceRecord.rule_id = AttendanceRule.id where dbo.fn_GetPinyin(userInfo.user_name) = #{name} ORDER BY AttendanceRecord.attendance_time desc
select phone_number from userInfo where dbo.fn_GetPinyin(user_name) = #{name}
select mail_address from userInfo where dbo.fn_GetPinyin(user_name) = #{name}
select * from PepperBusinessScope order by sort
select * from PepperCompanyProfile order by sort
select * from PepperEngineeringCases order by sort
select information from PepperSelfInfoAndAsk where type = 1
select information from PepperSelfInfoAndAsk where type = 2
